pullRequest.title: Update help text in cli commands
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

Update command help text

Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                   There are two built-in templates named, 'lib' and 'service''.
          
          
            
                   There are two built-in templates named 'lib' and 'service''.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -11,30 +11,18 @@ DESCRIPTION
        the project root.
 
        A template can also be specified when creating the new module.
-       If a template is not specified, this command creates a module
-       with a 'main' function.
-
-       There are three built-in templates named: 'main', 'service', and 'lib''.
-
-       You can download templates from Ballerina Central as well.
-       In that case, <template-name> becomes a qualified module name.
-
-           <org-name>/<package-name>[:<version>]
 
+       There are two built-in templates named, 'lib' and 'service''.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    push            Upload package to the Ballerina Central
          
          
            
                    push            Upload a package to Ballerina Central
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -36,13 +36,14 @@ BALLERINA COMMANDS
         format          Format Ballerina sources
 
    Module Commands:
-        pull            Pull a module from Ballerina Central
-        push            Upload module to the Ballerina Central
-        search          Search Ballerina Central for modules
+        pull            Pull a package from Ballerina Central
+        push            Upload package to the Ballerina Central

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -36,13 +36,14 @@ BALLERINA COMMANDS
         format          Format Ballerina sources
 
    Module Commands:
-        pull            Pull a module from Ballerina Central
-        push            Upload module to the Ballerina Central
-        search          Search Ballerina Central for modules
+        pull            Pull a package from Ballerina Central
+        push            Upload package to the Ballerina Central
+        search          Search Ballerina Central for packages
 
    Project Commands:
-        new             Create a new Ballerina project
-        add             Create a new Ballerina module in a project
+        new             Create a new project and initializes a Ballerina package
